front.title: Domain Subobjects for Resource ReserVation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE)

abstract.t: The Resource ReserVation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) specification and the Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) extensions to RSVP-TE allow abstract nodes and resources to be explicitly included in a path setup. Further Exclude Routes extensions to RSVP-TE allow abstract nodes and resources to be explicitly excluded in a path setup. This document specifies new subobjects to include or exclude 4-Byte Autonomous System (AS) and Interior Gateway Protocol (IGP) area during path setup.
